description: A pay dispute is continuing, two years after a recommended 3.5% rise was not implemented in full.
title: Isle of Man teachers vote to extend industrial action over pay
title_page: Isle of Man teachers vote to extend industrial action over pay - BBC News
maintext: The NASUWT said it would consult members on the "next phase" but action short of strike would continue in the meantime, which would mean refusing to do administrative tasks such as attending meetings.
